animeTitle: Hermes: Ai wa Kaze no Gotoku
animeDescription: Thousands of years in the past, a young boy named Hermes is named as a future great hero in a prophecy. Hermes grows up to save a beautiful princess and face the evil king Minos of Crete.  The first title in the series of anime films by the Happy Science cult.
animeRelated: ['Ougon no Hou: El Cantare no Rekishikan', 'Eien no Hou', 'Taiyou no Hou: El Cantare e no Michi']
animeVoices: ['Koyasu, Takehito', 'Nozawa, Nachi', 'Aomori, Shin', 'Murozono, Takehiro', 'Itou, Miki', 'Utsumi, Kenji', 'Hori, Katsunosuke', 'Koujiro, Chie']
